name: Gruß Vom Krampus (Greeting from Krampus)
description:
Gruß Vom Krampus
(Greeting from Krampus) 
.
Who’s Krampus? He’s the half-man, half-goat who comes around every year to chase naughty children and maybe even drag them to hell. European versions of St. Nicholas have long had scary counterparts like Belsnickle and Knecht Ruprecht who dole out punishment. Krampus is one such character who comes from folklore in Austria’s Alpine region, where he’s been frightening children and amusing adults for hundreds of years.
.
Happy long holiday and I wish y'all survive and live to the next year
